text.speaker: narrator
text.message: You wake up in the middle of a cemetery. The last thing you can remember is... well actually you can’t remember anything.

text.speaker: narrator
text.message: To the right you can see your fencing friends gathered in a group. You walk up closer...

text.speaker: narrator
text.message: Your friends are gathered around a map, chatting about some treasure guarded by a fire-breathing dragon.

text.speaker: narrator
text.message:
You remember that you can’t afford rent this month and the decision is just about made. 
 
One last thing, which three friends would you like to have join you on this adventure? (must be a fencer)

text.speaker: narrator
text.message: Now that you’re all set with your squad, let’s set off to your first location: Melody Valley
When you arrive at the valley, input the location key code so that I can be calibrated to that location.
